Just because someone is married with five children that does not mean that they can’t be persecuted for homosexuality in Russia or Tajikistan, which is why Austria is granting him asylum.

A Muslim man was first rejected asylum after not wanting to be drafted to fight in Ukraine. However, not wanting to be drafted is not grounds for asylum but being fearful of your life because of your sexual orientation is. So it’s likely he just forgot he was gay and that’s why his application was approved after disclosing that piece of information the second time around.
title: Gay Muslim man claims persecution, gets granted asylum, moves to new country with wife and five kids

There’s nearly a zero percent chance that Bath & Body Works intentionally made a candle to depict a KKK meeting. However, just because the intent was not there does not mean the woke mob won’t have a meltdown after being reminded that the KKK was a thing.

As you know, corporations often release holiday-themed merchandise, and it just so happens that not everyone is on the lookout for KKK-like hoods that are actually snowflakes. This is probably how Bath & Body Works released a candle, labeled “Snowed In”, which some argue is too close for comfort in terms of wh
title: Woke mob goes after Bath & Body Works over claims new candle looks KKK'ish

description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

The Biden-Harris Department of Justice is suing the State of Virginia over the governor's executive order requiring the removal of non-citizens from voter rolls. Today’s show breaks this down.

Virginia has barred non-citizens from voter rolls since 2006. The Department of Justice decided less than one month before the presidential election that this was a problem, even though these “non-citizens” self-identify as such.
title: Watch: The Steal is On! DOJ Fighting to Keep Illegal Votes

description:
For all of human history, biological sex was a thing, which is why it’s used as the deciding factor for sports. And although nothing in life is fair, even cavemen knew this was the justified way to go about things. However, one day progressives woke up and demanded an end to girls’ sports based on the premise that someone can feel some type of way despite biological reality.

Given the fact that ambiguous feelings don’t actually dictate anatomy, most people are not gaslighted into “affirming” their way in the pursuit of ending girls’ sports. So while the left pretends abortion is the most important social issue for females right now, they are actively working to end the rights of females everywhere. However, given how asinine this is, many people won’t stand up for this injustice.

The University of Nevada Girls Volleyball te
title: College Ignores Volleyball Teams Vote To Forfeit Against Team With Trans Player

description:

With less than three weeks to go, we're at the point in the presidential race where how the campaigns behave will tell you more than public poll numbers. And there are so many red flags going up with Kamala Harris, you would think the NFL refs were running things. Yes, I know those flags are yellow, but like most of you, I still can't get over last night's Bills/Jets game.

The most telling warning side of any presidential campaign is when elected officials don't want to be seen with you.
title: Watch: Kamala Harris throws herself under the bus, announces swing state Senator won't be seen with her

description:

Scott Jennings called out Democrats for caring more about trans women than “actual dudes.”

title: Scott Jennings: "No amount of hunting cosplay or cringy videos” are going to save Kamala Harris
